successes.title: SCHOOLISM SUBSCRIPTIONS: ART EDUCATION MADE AFFORDABLE
successes.description: To become the best, you must learn from the best. We've given you access to the top artists, now we want to make it affordable for all.

Pledges.description: Positive vibes - You get what we are trying to do and we appreciate that. Thank you for the positive vibes.

We are based in Canada, so Kickstarter makes us use Canadian dollars. Sorry for any confusion!
($40 USD = $50 CAD)

2 month subscription of a self-start course of your choosing on Schoolism.com.
